attributes.action: British Citizen for British National Overseas (BNO)
attributes.additional_details:
Full British Citizenship for British National Overseas (BNO).

The long wanted opportunity for British National Overseas Citizens to become a full British Citizen and give their loyalty to the United Kingdom and respect its rights and freedoms. So they can uphold its democratic values. So they will observe its laws faithfully and fulfill their duties and obligations as a British Citizen.
